title: Data Analysis with Python: Part 1 of 6 (Live Course)
excerpt: “Data Analysis with Python: Zero to Pandas” is a practical, beginner-friendly, and coding-focused introduction to data analysis covering the basics of Python, Numpy, Pandas, data visualization and exploratory data analysis. You can learn more and register for a Certificate of Accomplishment at http://zerotopandas.com
